about_the_game:
Step into the world of high-speed competition and personal growth with TrackTime. This adventure RPG invites you to experience the thrilling journey of an aspiring runner on a quest to become the ultimate champion in the prestigious Running League.

As a player, you will begin your journey as a determined and ambitious runner, striving to etch your name in the annals of the Running League. Your primary objective is to elevate your performance and attain the coveted title of Ultimate Champion. To achieve this, you must carefully balance intensive training with the complex demands of everyday life.

Navigate the challenges of a runner’s lifestyle, including managing your daily schedule, nutrition, and recovery. Juggle between rigorous training sessions, personal commitments, and social interactions to maintain peak performance and avoid burnout.

Participate in Races, against some of the elite runners of the Running League. Each competition presents unique obstacles and opportunities to showcase your skills. Your performance in these races will influence your reputation and progress within the Running League.

In TrackTime, every decision you make and every challenge you face will contribute to your ultimate goal of becoming the most renowned runner in the world. Embrace the thrill of competition, the grind of training, and the satisfaction of personal growth as you strive to become the Ultimate Champion of the Running League.

name: TrackTime
short_description: Playing as a runner with the ultimate goal of being the world champion, will you be able to maintain your stats while managing day-to-day life or fail the goal of being the world champ?
